title: Emote not in collection?
body: I think this happened to me once before but I unlocked an emote through the tft orbs and when I opened in my loot it said it was in my collection but when I checked it wasn't there, I think this the second emote I've had this happen too.

replies.body: I have had something similar too. I used to have a Nami skin but I took a hiatus from league for 2 years, came back and didn't have the skin no more =-(. Since I didn't buy it with rp it's not easily traceable I don't think. So unlucky =-(

Not so easily traceable on your end, but support should be able to go back through and find it if you give them as much info as you can.

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
Ok thank's Seras, I'll see what I can find.

Emote redemption seems to be very often delayed. Just wait a day or two and it should show up in your collection. If you don't see it after 48 hours or so, submit a ticket to player support: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new
This also just happened to me from the 2019 Orb, I reset my client but still no emote. {{sticker:sg-lux-2}}
